The Invocation was delivered by Rev. Wendell Foster.

Council Member Carrion moved  that the invocation be spread in full upon the Minutes and adopted.

Land Use Call-Ups

By the Chair of the Land Use Committee Council Member Eisland:
Pursuant to Rule 11.20(c) of the Council and Section 197-d (b)(3) of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby resolves that the action of the City Planning Commission on Uniform Land Use Procedure Application Number 010484 ZSK, a special permit shall be subject to Council review.  This application is related to application number 010483 ZMK which is subject to Council review pursuant to Section 197-d of the New York City Charter.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Call-Up be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, The Junction Special Permit, Brooklyn (010484ZSK)

Items.Title: Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges, and Elections

Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections consenting to the reappointment of LEE A. MAYERSOHN, as a Member of the New York City Tax Commission.

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections which was referred to on August 22, 2001, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to Section 31 and Section 153 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections hereby approves the reappointment of LEE A. MAYERSOHN, as a Member of the New York City Tax Commission, for the remainder of a six year term that began on January 7, 2000 and will expire on January 6, 2006.

Res. No. 2059

Resolution consenting to the appointment of LEE A. MAYERSOHN, as a Member of the New York City Tax Commission

By Council Member Povman:

Resolved, that pursuant to Section 31 and Section 153 of the New York City Charter, the Council does hereby approve the reappointment of LEE A. MAYERSOHN, as a Member of the New York City Tax Commission, for the remainder of a six year term that began on January 7, 2000 and will expire on January 6, 2006.
Items.MatterName: M 1279 - Lee A. Mayersohn, New York City Tax Commission

Items.Title:
Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections consenting to the appointment of BEN CELAJ, as a Member of the New York City Tax Commission.

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections which was referred to on August 22, 2001, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to Section 31 and Section 153 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections hereby approves the appointment of BEN CELAJ, as a Member of the New York City Tax Commission, for the term, which will expire on January 6, 2006.

Res. No. 2060

Resolution consenting to the appointment of BEN CELAJ, as a Member of the New York City Tax Commission

By Council Member Povman:

Resolved, that pursuant to Section 31 and Section 153 of the New York City Charter, the Council does hereby approve the appointment of BEN CELAJ, as a Member of the New York City Tax Commission, for the term, which will expire on January 6, 2006.
Items.MatterName: M 1280 - Ben Celaj, New York City Tax Commission
